summary: This is a combination coming out and first love story. The swimmer and diver Lucard is interested in attractive Martin. The film follows the characters' coming out with all its difficulties... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Michel Portal|Marcial Di Fonzo Bo|Mathilde Seigner|Vittoria Scognamiglio|Jacques Hansen|Stéphane Lévêque|Karim Lounis|Bernard Nissile|Bruno Bonomo|Stéphane Giusti|Benjamin Sanchiarelli|Serguei Tourountsev|Nedjib Djebarri|Louis Philippe Lopez|Elisabeth Giusti|Véronique Aude|Natasha Solignac|Jean-Charles Fonti|Ali Hadsj
title: El hombre que amo
